Notification Banner #

notification-banner-icon-fill-critical
#8b1703

The color used for icons in Critical status banners.

notification-banner-icon-fill-serious
#975f0e

The color used for icons in Serious status banners.

notification-banner-icon-fill-caution
#917d01

The color used for icons in Caution status banners.

notification-banner-icon-fill-normal
#007a33

The color used for icons in Normal status banners.

notification-banner-icon-fill-standby
#35798e

The color used for icons in Standby status banners.

notification-banner-icon-fill-off
#51555b

The color used for icons in Off status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-critical
#ff5f60

The color used for the background on Critical status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-serious
#ffcc57

The color used for the background on Serious status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-caution
#fded61

The color used for the background on Caution status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-normal
#99f666

The color used for the background on Normal status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-standby
#5ce2ff

The color used for the background on Standby status banners.

notification-banner-color-background-off
#bbc1c9

The color used for the background on Off status banners.

Status Symbol #

status-symbol-fill-critical
#ff3838

The color used to indicate items with a Critical status. Critical, error, alert, emergency, urgent.

status-symbol-fill-serious
#ffb302

The color used to indicate items with a Serious status. Serious, warning, needs attention.

status-symbol-fill-caution
#fce83a

The color used to indicate items with a Caution status. Caution, unstable, unsatisfactory.

status-symbol-fill-normal
#56f000

The color used to indicate items with a Normal status. Normal, on, ok, fine, go, satisfactory, success.

status-symbol-fill-standby
#2dccff

The color used to indicate items with a Standby status. Standby, available, enabled.

status-symbol-fill-off
#a4abb6

The color used to indicate items with an Off status. Off, unavailable, disabled.

status-symbol-border-critical
#66110200

The border color used for the Critical status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

status-symbol-border-serious
#66461800

The border color used for the Serious status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

status-symbol-border-caution
#64560000

The border color used for the Caution status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

status-symbol-border-normal
#005a0000

The border color used for the Normal status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

status-symbol-border-standby
#28576600

The border color used for the Standby status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

status-symbol-border-off
#3c3e4200

The border color used for the Off status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

Slider #

slider-radius-background-track
1px

Global Status Bar #

gsb-icon-fill
#4dacff

The primary color used for interactive elements in the Global Status Bar.

gsb-color-background
#172635

The background color of the Global Status Bar component.

Aa
gsb-color-text
#ffffff

The primary text color used within the Global Status Bar.
